com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring
Class ServerProbe

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.Probe
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.ServerProbe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, java.lang.Comparable
public class ServerProbe
extends Probe

ServerProbe - class that represents a ServerProbe that is assigned to a Server. This class may have a parent, TemplateProbe if this ServerProbe is a member of a ProbeSuite.

setPendingState

public void setPendingState(SatCluster clusterIn)
Sets this probe to have a pending state. Useful for new probes that you want to have a state of PENDING.

Parameters:
clusterIn - the SatCluster to use for the ProbeState
